title: Checkers
description: Immerse yourself in classic checkers on the go! Enjoy strategic moves, challenging AI, and hot-seat multiplayer fun in this classic checkers game! Dive into the timeless fun of Checkers! Experience sleek design, smart AI opponent, and thrilling hot-seat multiplayer matches in this classic board game. Master strategy and make every move count!
instructions: Follow on screen instructions.

title: Mini Games Puzzle Collection
description: Mini Games: Puzzle Collection is an addictive collection of mini games, including 3 of the most popular puzzle games. You need to use limited wooden planks to build a bridge to help doge eat bones on the other side of the river, draw lines to send donuts to doge. You can also experience the day of a stall owner, satisfying the needs of customers exactly. These fresh and interesting challenges require you to use your brain and solve them one by one through logical thinking.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Merge Combo
description: Immerse yourself in this captivating merge puzzle game! Combine matching blocks to score points and trigger epic combos. The more blocks you merge, the bigger the numbers and combos grow! Test your strategy and aim for the highest score—how large a number can you create?
instructions: Drag and merge identical blocks enjoying awesome combos!

title: Javelin Battle
description: Javelin Battle is a spear-throwing physics puzzle game with 2D stickman models. We need you to eliminate all incoming enemies at each level in the Normal Mode. When you destroy enemy infantry's shields, they will run to you quickly. I strongly suggest you destroy the enemy spearmen on the platforms first. Don't forget to choose skills to increase your abilities and power. Keep calm and aim carefully.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Find It - Find The Differences
description: Find It is an engaging puzzle game that tests your observation skills as you search for subtle differences between two nearly identical images. With colorful visuals and beautifully designed scenes, each level presents a fresh challenge. Whether you're spotting tiny details or uncovering hidden objects, Find It will keep you entertained and focused. Hone your attention to detail, enjoy the excitement of finding every difference, and experience hours of fun suitable for all ages!
instructions: Click on the pictures to carefully examine each detail, spot the differences, and successfully complete the levels.

title: Merge Squares
description: "Merge Squares" is an exciting puzzle game, where your task is to connect squares with same numbers. Using logic and strategic mind, you have to decide how to arrange the squares to combine them into one. Each level gets harder, how far can you go?
instructions: It is necessary to place three squares with same number side by side so they connect into a square with a larger number. The joker replaces any square. Levels have different goals - to score a given number of points, to get a square of a certain value, or to connect as many squares as possible. To achieve the result, you can use hints.

title: BillyTheBox
description: Want to deep dive into a cute graphics cozy puzzle game? BilBox is for you. Simple puzzle game which can be enjoyed by anyone who loves playing cozy puzzle games with fun elements.
instructions: Click light white suggestion cubes to move the player. Make the desired color sphere to reach position in few moves.

title: Single Stroke Line Draw
description: Single Stroke Draw Line is a puzzle game with with one touch line drawing. It is required for you to draw one line to connect all the points without any route repetition. - The rule is very simple, Draw given figures with only one touch. - Explore amazing levels of this puzzle at your fingertips and sharpen your brain IQ & skills. - Game level starts with very easy levels and increases in difficultly as you progress in the game.
instructions: Connect the dots and complete the levels.

title: Wordler
description: It's the same English word guessing game as Hackman I played when I was young. You are given six chances to guess a word that consists of only five letters. How many times can you get it right?
instructions: Suggest the valid 5 letter words for five times to assume the correct answer. Press ENTER to submit, and the color of letters will give you an additional hint. Gray means no letters are matching, Yellow means letter is matching but not right position, and Green means right letter, right position.

title: Words from Words
description: "Words from Words" is an exciting game, the purpose of which is to create as many different words as possible from the letters given to you. You can create 29 words from the word «example», «maverick» includes 71 words, and "chalkboard" stores as many as 142 words. Can you solve everything?
instructions: Click on the letters and create different words. The more words, the better! You can create only common nouns. Click on a word to get its definition!

title: Mine Sweeper
description: A perfect puzzle game with skill + luck + simple rules. The return of the most popular game in the world! Enjoy the minesweeper, the classic brainstorming game.
instructions: To win a round of Minesweeper, you must click on the board every square that doesn't have a mine under it. If you click the spot with no mines, you can see a number on the spot instead. It's the hint of ho many mines are around the spot.

title: Kick and Ride
description: Kick and Ride is a physics-based puzzle game consisting of two game modes. Drag and drop the block to make path for the soccer as well as for the vehicle. Enjoy the vibrant and colorful beach themed game.
instructions: Follow In Game Instructions.

title: Card Battle
description: Come to enter the exciting world of card battles, where strategy is combined with passion! In this card puzzle game, each card has its unique powers. Before the game. Choose to upgrade your coins or strength.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Traffic Escape Puzzle
description: Come to enter a complex maze in the Traffic Escape Puzzle! In this exciting puzzle game, get your car out safely. Find the right time to exit the vehicle. Be careful to avoid traffic jams and collisions. To slide the vehicle and create a clear path for cars. Each level presents a new traffic maze. And traffic flows become more and more complex. Come to use your ingenuity and strategize. Cleverly arrange all cars on a complex maze of roads.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Make It Boom!
description: Explosive puzzle adventure that challenges your strategy and timing skills! Your mission is simple: burst firecrackers to create thrilling chain reactions and clear each level. But beware—this isn’t just any ordinary puzzle game!
instructions: Tap and hold to light up the firecracker

title: Words with Prof. Wisely
description: ind words by connecting letters. Improve your attentiveness, train your brain! Keep in mind - some crosswords will be difficult to solve.
instructions: Use mouse or finger tap to play

title: Maze Cube 2048
description: Dive into a world of challenging puzzles that test your strategic skills! Become a true maze master! To conquer each level, you must carefully think ahead and plan your moves. The puzzles start easy, but watch out each new maze brings a greater challenge.
instructions: Swipe the cube through intricate mazes, merging it with other cubes with similar values as you progress.

title: Hide Moodeng Hippo!
description: Evil flea balls are raining down from above, and it's your job to keep the adorable baby hippo, Moodeng, safe! Tap on various objects in each level to activate, building a sturdy shelter for Moodeng. Key Features: - 50+ levels of exciting and brain-teasing puzzles. - Physics-based gameplay where every move counts. - Fun, adorable 2D graphics and engaging challenges. - A variety of objects to interact with, providing endless strategies for success.
instructions: -Tap on object to activate them -Object will fall due to gravity -Cover the baby hippos to protect from flea balls

title: Woodoku Block Puzzle
description: Welcome to experience the Woodoku Block Puzzle! This is a super fun casual puzzle game, especially for relaxing in your free time. The gameplay is very simple and very challenging! There are four modes you can choose from.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Merge Cube Challenge
description: Merge Cube Challenge offers a unique 2048 experience with its innovative endless mode. You can play alone or compete with your friends. Also, test your strategy and quick thinking skills by competing against the CPU. In endless mode, try to get the highest score by using the bomb special power. With the excitement increasing with each move, collect points and leave your opponents behind! Are you ready to immerse yourself in this excitement?
instructions: CPU Mode: Player 1: WASD or Arrow Keys Endless Mode: Player 1: WASD or Arrow Keys 2 Player Mode: Player 1: WASD Player 2: Arrow Keys

title: Shop Sorting Xmas
description: Love a well-organized, neatly arranged space? Then Shop Sorting Xmas is the perfect game for you! Step into a delightful Christmas-themed puzzle game where you’ll sort and arrange festive items in a magical Christmas toy shop. In this captivating holiday sorting game, find and match identical toys and Christmas decorations, organizing them on the shelves. Your goal is to gather three identical items together to create a triplet and clear the shelves.
instructions: The game is simple and fun to pick up! Just drag items and place them on the shelves. Match three identical items together on a shelf, and they’ll disappear. Clear all the shelves to complete a level! As you progress, unlock new Christmas items, holiday backgrounds, and shop shelves to bring even more cheer to your toy shop.

title: Doors Awakening
description: This is a challenging puzzle-solving online game. This game has wonderful 3D graphics enabling you to explore the handcrafted levels. The fascinating visual effects, realistic atmosphere, and natural camera controls will keep you returning for more. If you'd prefer puzzle games, don't miss this wonderful challenge.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Mahjong Sort Puzzle
description: This is an addictive matching puzzle game. If you are a mahjong fan and love matching games, this game is for you. You need to sort out the mahjongs, sort out the mahjongs with the same colour into a grid and they will all be eliminated. While playing the game, you will also exercise your logical thinking and spatial sense. So, come and join the challenging world of gaming.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Emoji Challenge
description: Emoji Challenge is an engaging skill game. Featuring levels constructed entirely with popular emojis. The game offers six distinct puzzle types: link puzzle, memory puzzle, word quiz, related puzzle, shadow puzzle, and crop puzzle. This game is perfect for players who enjoy brain teasers and want to test their problem-solving skills.
instructions: The game is played with the mouse or by touching the screen.

title: Sheep vs Wolf
description: Protect the sheeps by blocking the wolf's way. Simply click on tiles to block it. Every time you make a move The Wolf makes a move. So, be careful for the tile you block!
instructions: Click to block a single cell in the hexagonal grid.

title: Cube in Cube
description: Play the new 2048 game with unique mechanics! Develop strategies to clear cubes in endless mode or rescue the monkey. Challenge yourself now!
instructions: Click on any cube and then on the same cube next to it. The cubes will connect into a cube of the best level. Save the monkey or just get into the top of the best.

title: Merge TikTok Gravity Knife
description: This is an addictive elimination merge puzzle game. If you like synthetic elimination games, then this game is for you. They can remove a portion of the weapons that didn't merge, but there's only one free shot. Be careful, you have to score as many points as possible within the time limit, otherwise, you will have to start another game. Now join the challenging world of the game.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Push The Frog
description: Control your little frog to eat all the mosquitoes. Master the length of the frog's tongue and make the frog reach the appropriate position to eat the mosquitoes. Think carefully about planning the route. The game has a simple and interesting style, and the gameplay is educational and novel. It is very suitable for playing when killing time.
instructions: WASD or arrows to move, Spacebar pops out the frog's tongue

title: Merge Hotel Empire
description: You can generate and collect different new items by synthesizing the same items, and then use them to create and decorate a new mansion for the hotel empire of the story.
instructions: Click to interact and drag items to synthesize or merge!

title: Spooky Halloween Hidden Pumpkin
description: In Spooky Halloween Hidden Pumpkin, you’ll explore haunted locations like creepy graveyards, abandoned houses, foggy forests, and more. Each level is uniquely designed with eerie Halloween-themed settings full of tricks and illusions. Your challenge is to locate 10 pumpkins hidden in plain sight within each scene. The faster you find them, the better your score!
instructions: Explore Each Scene: Every level introduces a new Halloween-themed location full of details. Use your sharp eyes to scan the scene and uncover the pumpkins. Find the Hidden Pumpkins: There are 10 pumpkins hidden in each level. They may be cleverly disguised among other spooky elements, so pay close attention!

title: Pin Puzzle Save The Sheep
description: Pin Puzzle: Save The Sheep is an exciting pin-pulling game. You will test your brain intelligence and have endless fun. In this game, you have to make the sheep eat food and save them from their predicament. You have many other tasks like pulling the pin to make the dog eat the food. But be aware that you may meet a lot of obstacles like bombs, lava, etc. and you need to avoid them. There are many interesting levels to play in this crazy puzzle game. Come and join the game.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Murder
description: Ready for the scary world of Murder? Colorful Halloween scenes, accompanied by scary ghosts and jack-o '-lanterns, enhance the immersion of the game. On this most mysterious night,let you try a nervous assassination adventure! You will be a cunning assassin who will seize the moment to kill the king. Play the king when you kill successfully.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Remove the Evidence
description: You’re not just solving puzzles—you’re covering your tracks! Step into the shoes of a hilariously clumsy criminal mastermind who always gets the job done but never without leaving a trail of chaos behind. Your mission? Clean up your mess before the authorities arrive!
instructions: Use mouse or finger to tap objects and move them

title: Word Voyager
description: Word Voyager - Embark on the ultimate quest for words,right on your touchscreen! Solve puzzles and expand your vocabulary smoothly. Follow Olivia, your trusty guide, as she navigates you through the gentle murmurs of an ancient library. Uncover secrets during the 'Daily Mission'. Find hidden stars that unlock new thematic categories that will take you on a odyssey through the infinite universe of words.
instructions: Simply draw the word you found in the matrix of letters. You get stars while playing. You can unlock more categories with the stars you find hidden behind some words.

title: Draw And Escape
description: Car Games: Draw And Escape is a collection of parking puzzle games and drawing puzzle games. Draw Bridge requires you to draw a line across a defined area to help the yellow car to the finish line. When you meet the steps, you can also draw bridges to build a track to the finish line. Use your creativity to design the perfect path to win! Parking Jam 2d requires you to help all cars out of the parking lot smoothly and pay attention to the order of cars, to prevent traffic accidents.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Scary Pairs
description: In the new exciting online game Scary Pairs you will have fun going through the levels of an interesting puzzle that is dedicated to Halloween. In front of you on the screen you will see a playing field on which a certain number of cards will be located. They lie face down and in one move you can turn over any two cards. Look at the images on them, because after a while the cards will return to their original state and you will make your move again.
instructions: The game is played with the mouse or by touching the screen.

title: Jelly Block Puzzle
description: Dive into the fun with our vibrant jelly merging game! Explore a world filled with countless levels, merge jellies, use power-ups, and stay entertained. Challenge your brain and see how far you can go in this delightful, jelly-colored adventure!
instructions: The game features an unlimited number of levels. Your goal is to connect jellies of the same color and achieve the required number of color combinations to complete each level. You can use two power-ups: one to destroy a selected jelly and another to swap two jellies.

title: Word Scramble - Family Tales
description: Want a distraction from the annoyances of daily life, or is your brain tired of solving exactly the same problems? Welcome to Word Scramble: Family Tales! Train your gray matter by solving word search puzzles and level up your vocabulary! An exciting family adventure, colorful locations and engaging play make this game hard to tear yourself away from. The story of a long-awaited child finally arriving in a family will come to life literally in front of your eyes.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Money Factory - Earn a Billion
description: Prepare for a thrilling journey into the world of finance! As the owner of a money factory, you'll build and link mechanisms to boost your earnings with every step. Overcome exciting challenges where strategy is crucial to your success. Collect powerful boosters, create combos, and unlock new levels to discover even more ways to grow your fortune. Upgrade your factory to fast-track your rise to riches and become a financial powerhouse!
instructions: 1. Making money is easy at first, but you'll need creativity and luck to keep growing your factory. 2. Buy boosters, fill the field, and multiply your earnings. 3. Hold your finger or mouse button to move boosters, release to place or combine two identical ones. 4. Aim to become a billionaire!

title: Hexa puzzle
description: Stretch your mind and train your brain with this addictive block puzzle game. Can you solve all of the hundreds of free puzzles? Put your mind and brain to work to solve the puzzle game by placing the unique hexagon pieces neatly into the puzzle grid. Merge each hexo shaped piece into the grid one by one. Similar to Tetris, they all need to fit together to complete the puzzle. You may need more time to match all the blocks into the super perfect spot - but that's fine, there are no time limit!
instructions: Drag the colored hexagon shaped puzzle pieces into the hexa grid frame. Block Hexa Puzzle is a xtetris style puzzle game, an addictive block puzzle. The goal is to drag pieces to board and fill up all grids.

title: Cute Folding Paper
description: Cute Folding Paper is an origami online puzzle game. Combines the creative fun of paper crafts with challenging logic puzzle challenges, making it the perfect game for kids and family play .Perfect for children and good for practicing logic, reasoning, and problem-solving skills. Step by step, solve puzzling origami puzzles where the order of folding is the key to clearing the level.What are you waiting for? If you like our games, please share them with your friends to double the fun!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Block Mania
description: Block Mania: Mixing classic block and jigsaw puzzles, it’s a burst of creativity into beloved games! With easy controls, immersive sound effects, and a catchy beat, Block Mania guarantees addictive fun!
instructions: - Drag and drop blocks to clear rows or columns. - Plan ahead for upcoming blocks to maximize your score.

title: Save Stranding Fish
description: Help all the little fish that unfortunately wash up on the beach to escape their predicament.You must pay attention to the order in which you rescue the fish.
instructions: Move your hands to help the little fish

title: Bus Jam
description: Welcome to the thrilling world of "Bus Jam: Clear the Bus Stop," presented by Golden Guns Studio, a color sort puzzle, fun-packed game where your task is to skillfully bus match 3d passengers onboard onto buses of the same color. Imagine a busy Bus Jam stop with vibrant buses and puzzled passengers eager to board. Your mission? Ensure each person finds their way to the right bus, and brace yourself as the color puzzle master.
instructions: So, prepare yourself for the challenge. Can you master the sort puzzle, shuffle passengers, and release VIPs in on time? With its simple yet clever bus match gameplay,

title: BLOCK MATCH 8x8
description: Place blocks to form vertical or horizontal rows and erase the target blocks! The game is over when no more blocks can be placed or there are no moves left.
instructions: Drag to move blocks.

title: Royal Family Tree
description: Step into the world of royalty and unravel the secrets of noble bloodlines in this captivating family tree puzzle game. Your task is to complete intricate royal family trees by using the clues provided, piecing together generations of kings, queens, princes, and princesses.
instructions: Solve royal family tree puzzles by piecing together clues and uncovering generations of noble bloodlines.

title: Cube Stories: Escape
description: Immerse yourself in a fascinating plot and follow a brave video blogger who bravely goes into the dark embrace of an abandoned mansion. As you make your way through each carefully designed room, you'll encounter a series of cryptic puzzles and mind-bending challenges that will test your intelligence, observation, and creative thinking. As the plot develops, you will be plunged into the darkness of the house's past and the mysterious history of its former inhabitants.
instructions: The goal of the game is to escape from the room. In order to get out of the room, you need to solve all the riddles and puzzles. In order to interact with an object, you need to click on it or move it.

title: Timberland Arrange Puzzle Game
description: Arrange the animals and color them! А refreshing reinterpretation of classic Tag and Sudoku. Assemble a logical puzzle by finding intersections between different types of hints. Enjoy colorful hand-drawn graphics, fascinating sounds of nature and cheerful cries of animals! It may seem that the game is quite simple. However, level by level you will dive deeper into the rabbit hole, discover new mechanics, and the number of combinations will increase reaching hundred thousand!
instructions: The goal is to find a suitable place for each animal on the field and paint them in 3 colors, finding intersections between different types of hints. Use the buttons to select the beast, then click on the desired cell on the field and the beast will be carved in stone. Then choose a color, click on the beast again, one stroke of the brush, and it will come to life! Each of the 9 pets has its own character.

title: Brain puzzles-Quests
description: This is the puzzle game filled with challenging, interesting tasks that will help you relax and have fun. There are games for training thinking, mental tasks, and IQ tests suitable for those who like to think. Develop logic, pump your brains!
instructions: Carefully read the task on the screen. It will let you know what needs to be done. Use your logic and ingenuity to solve problems. This may include dragging objects, clicking on various items on the screen, or performing other actions. If you find it difficult to solve a puzzle, think outside the box or try different approaches. If you get stuck, you can use hints. Usually, to get hints, you need to watch commercials or spend in-game currency.

title: Landmine Cube
description: In Landmine Cube you will you will take the role of a rolling cube that has to collect all the jewels in each level, without step on the landmines scattered around the floor. Every time you step on one of them, you will lose a life. If you lose all the lives, you will have to restart the level from the ground up. Do not worry, the Cube knows when a landmine is near, and it will start to glow boldly. Try your best and complete all the 21 levels of this engaging puzzle game!
instructions: use WASD / Arrow Keys / Touch the on-screen arrows to move the cube
